children.label: DISPLAY'START O
children.name: DISPLAY'START O
children.originalText: DISPLAY 'START OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'

children.label: DISPLAY'START O
children.name: DISPLAY'START O
children.originalText: DISPLAY 'START OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.

children.label: Yes
children.name: Yes
children.originalText:
PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF

children.label:
IS 
END-OF-FILE = 'N'?
children.name:
IS 
END-OF-FILE = 'N'?
children.originalText:
IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                   PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF
               END-IF

children.label: PERFORM UNTIL END-OF-FILE = 'Y
children.name: PERFORMUNTILEND
children.originalText:
PERFORM UNTIL END-OF-FILE = 'Y'
               IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                   PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF
               END-IF
           END-PERFORM

children.label: PERFORMUNTILEND
children.name: PERFORMUNTILEND
children.originalText:
PERFORM UNTIL END-OF-FILE = 'Y'
               IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                   PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF
               END-IF
           END-PERFORM.

children.label: DISPLAY'END OF
children.name: DISPLAY'END OF
children.originalText: DISPLAY 'END OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'

children.label: DISPLAY'END OF
children.name: DISPLAY'END OF
children.originalText: DISPLAY 'END OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.

children.label:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'?
children.name:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'?
children.originalText:
IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF

children.label:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.name:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.originalText:
IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
               PERFORM 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
           ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF
           END-IF

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM

children.label:
IS 
APPL-EOF?
children.name:
IS 
APPL-EOF?
children.originalText:
IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF

children.label:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.name:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.originalText:
IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF
           END-IF

children.label: IFACCTFILE-STAT
children.name: IFACCTFILE-STAT
children.originalText:
IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
               PERFORM 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
           ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
children.name: 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
children.originalText:
1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT.
           READ ACCTFILE-FILE INTO ACCOUNT-RECORD.
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
               PERFORM 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
           ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: DISPLAY'ACCT-ID
children.name: DISPLAY'ACCT-ID
children.originalText:
DISPLAY 'ACCT-ID                 :'   ACCT-ID
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS      :'   ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-BAL           :'   ACCT-CURR-BAL
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT       :'   ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT  :'   ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-OPEN-DATE          :'   ACCT-OPEN-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE     :'   ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-REISSUE-DATE       :'   ACCT-REISSUE-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT    :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT     :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-GROUP-ID           :'   ACCT-GROUP-ID
           DISPLAY '-------------------------------------------------'
           EXIT.

children.label: 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
children.name: 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
children.originalText:
1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD.
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ID                 :'   ACCT-ID
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS      :'   ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-BAL           :'   ACCT-CURR-BAL
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT       :'   ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT  :'   ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-OPEN-DATE          :'   ACCT-OPEN-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE     :'   ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-REISSUE-DATE       :'   ACCT-REISSUE-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT    :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT     :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-GROUP-ID           :'   ACCT-GROUP-ID
           DISPLAY '-------------------------------------------------'
           EXIT.

children.label:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.name:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.originalText:
IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
           END-IF

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM

children.label:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.name:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.originalText:
IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF

children.label: OPENINPUTACCTFI
children.name: OPENINPUTACCTFI
children.originalText:
OPEN INPUT ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: 0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN
children.name: 0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN
children.originalText:
0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN.
           MOVE 8 TO APPL-RESULT.
           OPEN INPUT ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT

children.label:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.name:
IS 
ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'?
children.originalText:
IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               SUBTRACT APPL-RESULT FROM APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT
           END-IF

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM

children.label:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.name:
IS 
APPL-AOK?
children.originalText:
IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF

children.label: CLOSEACCTFILE-F
children.name: CLOSEACCTFILE-F
children.originalText:
CLOSE ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               SUBTRACT APPL-RESULT FROM APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: 9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE
children.name: 9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE
children.originalText:
9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE.
           ADD 8 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT.
           CLOSE ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               SUBTRACT APPL-RESULT FROM APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: DISPLAY'ABENDIN
children.name: DISPLAY'ABENDIN
children.originalText:
DISPLAY 'ABENDING PROGRAM'
           MOVE 0 TO TIMING
           MOVE 999 TO ABCODE
           CALL 'CEE3ABD'.

children.label: 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
children.name: 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
children.originalText:
9999-ABEND-PROGRAM.
           DISPLAY 'ABENDING PROGRAM'
           MOVE 0 TO TIMING
           MOVE 999 TO ABCODE
           CALL 'CEE3ABD'.

children.label: Yes
children.name: Yes
children.originalText:
MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04

children.label: No
children.name: No
children.originalText:
ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04

children.label:
IS 
IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-?
children.name:
IS 
IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-?
children.originalText:
IF  IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-STAT1 = '9'
               MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           END-IF

children.label: IFIO-STATUSNOTN
children.name: IFIO-STATUSNOTN
children.originalText:
IF  IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-STAT1 = '9'
               MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
children.name: 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
children.originalText:
9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS.
           IF  IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-STAT1 = '9'
               MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           END-IF
           EXIT.

children.label: para-group:
children.name: para-group:
children.originalText:
DISPLAY 'START OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.
           PERFORM 0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN.
       
           PERFORM UNTIL END-OF-FILE = 'Y'
               IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                   PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF
               END-IF
           END-PERFORM.
       
           PERFORM 9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE.
       
           DISPLAY 'END OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.
       
           GOBACK.
       
       
       
       
       1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT.
           READ ACCTFILE-FILE INTO ACCOUNT-RECORD.
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
               PERFORM 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
           ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD.
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ID                 :'   ACCT-ID
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS      :'   ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-BAL           :'   ACCT-CURR-BAL
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT       :'   ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT  :'   ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-OPEN-DATE          :'   ACCT-OPEN-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE     :'   ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-REISSUE-DATE       :'   ACCT-REISSUE-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT    :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT     :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-GROUP-ID           :'   ACCT-GROUP-ID
           DISPLAY '-------------------------------------------------'
           EXIT.
       
       0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN.
           MOVE 8 TO APPL-RESULT.
           OPEN INPUT ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE.
           ADD 8 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT.
           CLOSE ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               SUBTRACT APPL-RESULT FROM APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       9999-ABEND-PROGRAM.
           DISPLAY 'ABENDING PROGRAM'
           MOVE 0 TO TIMING
           MOVE 999 TO ABCODE
           CALL 'CEE3ABD'.
       
       
       9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS.
           IF  IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-STAT1 = '9'
               MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           END-IF
           EXIT.

label: ProcedureDivisionBodyContext/cdfe3282-dab8-4ef5-907d-3cc060482639
name: ProcedureDivisionBodyContext/cdfe3282-dab8-4ef5-907d-3cc060482639
originalText:
DISPLAY 'START OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.
           PERFORM 0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN.
       
           PERFORM UNTIL END-OF-FILE = 'Y'
               IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                   PERFORM 1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT
                   IF  END-OF-FILE = 'N'
                       DISPLAY ACCOUNT-RECORD
                   END-IF
               END-IF
           END-PERFORM.
       
           PERFORM 9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE.
       
           DISPLAY 'END OF EXECUTION OF PROGRAM CBACT01C'.
       
           GOBACK.
       
       
       
       
       1000-ACCTFILE-GET-NEXT.
           READ ACCTFILE-FILE INTO ACCOUNT-RECORD.
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
               PERFORM 1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD
           ELSE
               IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '10'
                   MOVE 16 TO APPL-RESULT
               ELSE
                   MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
               END-IF
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               IF  APPL-EOF
                   MOVE 'Y' TO END-OF-FILE
               ELSE
                   DISPLAY 'ERROR READING ACCOUNT FILE'
                   MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
                   PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
               END-IF
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       1100-DISPLAY-ACCT-RECORD.
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ID                 :'   ACCT-ID
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS      :'   ACCT-ACTIVE-STATUS
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-BAL           :'   ACCT-CURR-BAL
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT       :'   ACCT-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT  :'   ACCT-CASH-CREDIT-LIMIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-OPEN-DATE          :'   ACCT-OPEN-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE     :'   ACCT-EXPIRAION-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-REISSUE-DATE       :'   ACCT-REISSUE-DATE
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT    :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-CREDIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT     :'   ACCT-CURR-CYC-DEBIT
           DISPLAY 'ACCT-GROUP-ID           :'   ACCT-GROUP-ID
           DISPLAY '-------------------------------------------------'
           EXIT.
       
       0000-ACCTFILE-OPEN.
           MOVE 8 TO APPL-RESULT.
           OPEN INPUT ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               MOVE 0 TO APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               MOVE 12 TO APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR OPENING ACCTFILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       9000-ACCTFILE-CLOSE.
           ADD 8 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT.
           CLOSE ACCTFILE-FILE
           IF  ACCTFILE-STATUS = '00'
               SUBTRACT APPL-RESULT FROM APPL-RESULT
           ELSE
               ADD 12 TO ZERO GIVING APPL-RESULT
           END-IF
           IF  APPL-AOK
               CONTINUE
           ELSE
               DISPLAY 'ERROR CLOSING ACCOUNT FILE'
               MOVE ACCTFILE-STATUS TO IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS
               PERFORM 9999-ABEND-PROGRAM
           END-IF
           EXIT.
       
       9999-ABEND-PROGRAM.
           DISPLAY 'ABENDING PROGRAM'
           MOVE 0 TO TIMING
           MOVE 999 TO ABCODE
           CALL 'CEE3ABD'.
       
       
       9910-DISPLAY-IO-STATUS.
           IF  IO-STATUS NOT NUMERIC
           OR  IO-STAT1 = '9'
               MOVE IO-STAT1 TO IO-STATUS-04(1:1)
               MOVE 0        TO TWO-BYTES-BINARY
               MOVE IO-STAT2 TO TWO-BYTES-RIGHT
               MOVE TWO-BYTES-BINARY TO IO-STATUS-0403
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           ELSE
               MOVE '0000' TO IO-STATUS-04
               MOVE IO-STATUS TO IO-STATUS-04(3:2)
               DISPLAY 'FILE STATUS IS: NNNN' IO-STATUS-04
           END-IF
           EXIT.
